**Example 1: 修改知识标签**

修改知识标签

Input: 

```
tccli lke ModifyAttributeLabel --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --BotBizId 1696822786072117248 \
    --AttributeBizId 208 \
    --AttrKey tb \
    --AttrName 属性修改
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "73f925c5-e9c6-476c-ab2f-dc3de7088ed9"
    }
}
```
